characteristics.name: Attention Span
characteristics.description: Your community's potential is limited by your attention, not your ideas. You focus on the output before optimizing your input streams.

options.description: You concentrate on a single task for an extended period.
You easily shift between tasks and lose momentum.

characteristics.name: Communication Style
characteristics.description: Your community is a garden - are you planting seeds or just picking flowers? You focus on creating value for others.

options.description: You care deeply about the well-being of your community members.
You prioritize personal gain over collective growth.

characteristics.name: Digital Footprint
characteristics.description: Your digital footprint is too valuable to leave unattended. You take steps to protect your online identity.

options.description: You invest in robust security measures to safeguard your data.
You neglect to prioritize your online safety.

characteristics.name: Community Value
characteristics.description: Your community builders create more value than they capture. They focus on forming connections and unlocking opportunities.

options.description: You produce value that benefits others, often without direct recognition.
You primarily consume resources and attention from your community.

characteristics.name: Attention Abundance
characteristics.description: Attention is abundant, but sustained attention is scarce. You prioritize engagement over mere visibility.

options.description: You concentrate on deepening connections with your community members.
You spread yourself too thin and lose focus on individual relationships.

characteristics.name: Value Measurement
characteristics.description: The real metrics are in the connections formed, opportunities unlocked, and lives changed. You track meaningful outcomes.

options.description: You rely on numbers and metrics to evaluate your impact.
You prioritize the emotional resonance of your community's experiences.

characteristics.name: Impact Measurement
characteristics.description: Community builders create more value than they capture. You assess the depth of their influence.

options.description: You recognize and celebrate the substantial impact of your community members.
You underestimate the importance of individual contributions.

characteristics.name: Personality Traits
characteristics.description: Your personality is a blend of traits that consistently appear in your content. You cultivate a unique identity.

options.description: You exude self-assurance and faith in your abilities.
You tend to be more reserved and introspective.
